vsParam:
Why all the noise... What's wrong, Peppermint?
I can't believe you brought humans here...

So... Sorry, Your Majesty!
But it's urgent!

Humph... I think it's probably because of the dragon
which is disrupting the human's world.

It has nothing to do with me as long as
the dragon doesn't threaten my Fairyland.

Come on, Lord Thunbergia.
Think twice, OK?

Peppermint is asking us for help, doesn't it mean
that we're under threat too?

Yeah... Right! Fairies outside the Fairyland
might be under attack anytime!

Exactly. This problem isn't exclusive to
the human's world... What do you think?

Humph... But they can't do anything. In front of
that dragon, humans are too weak to do anything.

Exact... Exactly! So, to settle this matter,
we're here to ask for your help...

Yes. We may stand a chance of winning
if we could seal that dragon's magic power! So, please...

"Son of Vita"... The super magic power
in you came from that dragon?

Huh? Oh, you mean this scale?
Yeah, it's from the dragon!

So, it means...
It's not impossible to seal that dragon's magic power.
Really!? Could you please enlighten us...

But, it remains a question whether we could do it.
Anyway... it's just prate if we can't do it.

"Son of Vita", show your power. If your alchemy
is not ready yet, then everything is off the table.

Oh... Huh? What kind of item is it? I haven't quite got
what that means, but [px], it's heavy responsibility for you!
